column10: Info
Certain Commodities can be purchased at certain stations.
It's said so in their description, as well as the system(s) they can be found in.
Item description also says where the item is imported from.
There are now FIVE levels of rarity (called GRADES in-game). The middle one (3 leafs) is not explicitly
mentionned in the item's description.
Levels go as Very Common/Common/<Standard>/Rare/Very Rare
Components also have subcategories now.
5 objects by subcat, one for each rarity level.
Ele = Element
Man = Manufactured Material
Com = Commodity
SOONTILL RELICS available at Cheranovsky City in NGURII.
META ALLOYS are available at Darnielle's Progress in MAIA.
If you go there, consider bringing some for others!
Wake scanning requires a Wake Scanner (utility mount)
FINDING COMMODITIES BEST MARKETS
Follow this example :
"magnetic emitter coils", description says "industrial/refinery closte to leesti"
-> go to leesti, show trade routes for magnetic emitter coils on galmap
buy trade data of refinery and industrial systems in gal map
-> leads to chemaluk -> virts dock -> high supply (200 k+)
HOW TO LOCATE MATS/DATA + SHIP TYPE
Actually, everything is in the description. Just read, and add your info via comments.
Thanks
Mission requiring to deliver methanol monohydrate
